EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesCurr.label: Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesCurr.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date, including liabilities incurred and payable to vendors for goods and services received, taxes, interest, rent and utilities, compensation costs, payroll taxes and fringe benefits (other than pension and postretirement obligations), contractual rights and obligations, and statutory obligations.

AccountsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Accounts Payable
AccountsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

CapitalLeasesIncomeStatementDirectFinanc.label: Capital Leases, Income Statement, Direct Financing Lease Revenue
CapitalLeasesIncomeStatementDirectFinanc.description: Revenue realized in the period on direct financing leases.

CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinanc.label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Direct Financing Leases
CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinanc.description: The net investment in direct financing leases as of the balance sheet date consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinanc.label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Direct Financing Leases, Deferred Income
CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinanc.description: The remaining (unamortized) difference between the gross investment in a direct financing lease and the cost or carrying amount, if different, of the leased property as of the balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinanc.label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Direct Financing Leases, Minimum Payments to be Received
CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinanc.description: Amount of remaining payments as of the balance sheet date that lessees are obligated to make or can be required to make under direct financing leases, including any guarantee of residual value and executory costs. The amount also includes any guaranteed rental payments by an unrelated third-party provided that are financially capable of making such payments.

CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinanc.label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Direct Financing Leases, Unguaranteed Residual Values of Leased Property
CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinanc.description: The estimate of the lease property's economic value at the end of the direct financing lease term excluding any amounts guaranteed by either the lessee or a third-party.

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Including Disposal Group and Discontinued Operations
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including, but not limited to, disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

ContractualObligation.label: Contractual Obligation
ContractualObligation.description: Amount of contractual obligation, including but not limited to, long-term debt, capital lease obligations, operating lease obligations, purchase obligations, and other commitments.

ContractWithCustomerLiability.label: Contract with Customer, Liability
ContractWithCustomerLiability.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

DebtInstrumentPeriodicPaymentPrincipal.label: Debt Instrument, Periodic Payment, Principal
DebtInstrumentPeriodicPaymentPrincipal.description: Amount of the required periodic payments applied to principal.

DeferredOfferingCosts.label: Deferred Offering Costs
DeferredOfferingCosts.description: Specific incremental costs directly attributable to a proposed or actual offering of securities which are deferred at the end of the reporting period.

DeferredRevenue.label: Deferred Revenue
DeferredRevenue.description: Amount of deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

Depreciation.label: Depreciation
Depreciation.description: The amount of expense recognized in the current period that reflects the allocation of the cost of tangible assets over the assets' useful lives. Includes production and non-production related depreciation.

DirectFinancingLeaseDeferredSellingProfi.label: Direct Financing Lease, Deferred Selling Profit
DirectFinancingLeaseDeferredSellingProfi.description: Amount of deferred selling profit from direct financing lease.

DirectFinancingLeaseLeaseIncome.label: Direct Financing Lease, Lease Income
DirectFinancingLeaseLeaseIncome.description: Amount of lease income from variable lease payments, interest income on direct financing lease and after offset of loss recognized at commencement.

DirectFinancingLeaseLeaseReceivable.label: Direct Financing Lease, Lease Receivable
DirectFinancingLeaseLeaseReceivable.description: Present value of lease payments not yet received by lessor and amount expected to be derived from underlying asset, following end of lease term, guaranteed by lessee or other third party unrelated to lessor, from direct financing lease.

DirectFinancingLeaseNetInvestmentInLease.label: Direct Financing Lease, Net Investment in Lease
DirectFinancingLeaseNetInvestmentInLease.description: Amount of net investment in direct financing lease.

DirectFinancingLeaseUnguaranteedResidual.label: Direct Financing Lease, Unguaranteed Residual Asset
DirectFinancingLeaseUnguaranteedResidual.description: Present value expected to be derived from underlying asset, following end of lease term, not guaranteed by lessee or other third party unrelated to lessor.

DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerCashDist.label: Distribution Made to Limited Partner, Cash Distributions Paid
DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerCashDist.description: Amount of cash distribution paid to unit-holder of limited partnership (LP).

DueToRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Due to Related Parties
DueToRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of obligations due all related parties.

EscrowDeposit.label: Escrow Deposit
EscrowDeposit.description: The designation of funds furnished by a borrower to a lender to assure future payments of the borrower's real estate taxes and insurance obligations with respect to a mortgaged property. Escrow deposits may be made for a variety of other purposes such as earnest money and contingent payments. This element excludes replacement reserves which are an escrow separately provided for within the US GAAP taxonomy.

FeesAndCommissions.label: Fees and Commissions (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
FeesAndCommissions.description: Amount of fees and commissions from financial services and banking activities and correspondent clearing. Includes fees from depositor accounts, credit cards, merchant discounts, and fiduciary and trust activities, guarantee fees, investment advisory, management, and administrative fees, transfer agent fees, and insurance commissions.

FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.label: Finance Lease, Principal Payments
FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.description: Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.

GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets1.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Assets
GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets1.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets, including but not limited to property plant and equipment, intangible assets and equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.

GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: General and Administrative Expense
GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total of expenses of managing and administering the affairs of an entity, including affiliates of the reporting entity, which are not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.label: General Partners' Capital Account
GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the general partner's ownership interest.

GeneralPartnersContributedCapital.label: General Partners' Contributed Capital
GeneralPartnersContributedCapital.description: The amount of capital contributed by the general partner.

GeneralPartnersOfferingCosts.label: General Partners' Offering Costs
GeneralPartnersOfferingCosts.description: The cumulative amount of offering costs allocated to the general partner.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

IncomeTaxReconciliationDeductions.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationDeductions.description: Amount of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction. Includes, but is not limited to, dividend deduction, deduction for dividend paid to employee stock ownership plan (ESOP), Medicare prescription drug benefit subsidy deduction, and other deductions.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Depreciation and Amortization, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible depreciation and amortization.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Leases, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible lease expense.

IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherReconcilingI.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Reconciling Items, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherReconcilingI.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to tax exempt income, equity in earnings (loss) of an unconsolidated subsidiary, minority noncontrolling interest income (loss), tax holiday, disposition of a business, disposition of an asset, repatriation of foreign earnings, repatriation of foreign earnings jobs creation act of 2004, increase (decrease) in enacted tax rate, prior year income taxes, increase (decrease) in deferred tax asset valuation allowance, and other adjustments.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to vendors for goods and services received and the amount of obligations and expenses incurred but not paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInterestReceiva.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Interest Receivable, Net
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInterestReceiva.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from borrowers for interest payments.

IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerLi.label: Increase (Decrease) in Contract with Customer, Liability
IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerLi.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredRevenue.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Revenue
IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredRevenue.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

IncreaseDecreaseInLeasingReceivables.label: Increase (Decrease) in Leasing Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInLeasingReceivables.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from lessees arising from lease agreements.

IncreaseDecreaseInNotesPayableCurrent.label: Increase (Decrease) in Notes Payable, Current
IncreaseDecreaseInNotesPayableCurrent.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in current portion (due within one year or one business cycle) of obligations evidenced by formal promissory notes.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingLiabilit.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingLiabilit.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating liabilities classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInSecurityDeposits.label: Increase (Decrease) in Security Deposits
IncreaseDecreaseInSecurityDeposits.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in security deposits.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InterestIncomeOther.label: Interest Income, Other
InterestIncomeOther.description: Amount of interest income earned from interest bearing assets classified as other.

InterestPaidNet.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
InterestPaidNet.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

InterestPayableCurrent.label: Interest Payable, Current
InterestPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of [accrued] interest payable on all forms of debt, including trade payables, that has been incurred and is unpaid. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

InterestPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Interest Payable
InterestPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Amount of interest payable on debt, including, but not limited to, trade payables.

InterestReceivable.label: Interest Receivable
InterestReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.

InterestReceivableCurrent.label: Interest Receivable, Current
InterestReceivableCurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of current interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

InvestmentBankingAdvisoryBrokerageAndUnd.label: Investment Banking, Advisory, Brokerage, and Underwriting Fees and Commissions
InvestmentBankingAdvisoryBrokerageAndUnd.description: Amount of fees and commissions from banking, advisory, brokerage, and securities underwriting activities. Activities include, but are not limited to, underwriting securities, private placements of securities, investment advisory and management services, merger and acquisition services, sale and servicing of mutual funds, and other related consulting fees.

InvestmentBankingRevenue.label: Investment Banking Revenue
InvestmentBankingRevenue.description: Includes (1) underwriting revenue (the spread between the resale price received and the cost of the securities and related expenses) generated through the purchasing, distributing and reselling of new issues of securities (alternatively, could be a secondary offering of a large block of previously issued securities); and (2) fees earned for mergers, acquisitions, divestitures, restructurings, and other types of financial advisory services.

InvestmentIncomeInterest.label: Investment Income, Interest
InvestmentIncomeInterest.description: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the limited partners' ownership interests.

LimitedPartnersContributedCapital.label: Limited Partners' Contributed Capital
LimitedPartnersContributedCapital.description: The amount of capital contributed by the limited partners.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net Amount
LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans held for sale.

LoansAssumed1.label: Loans Assumed
LoansAssumed1.description: The fair value of loans assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

LoansPayable.label: Loans Payable
LoansPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

LoansPayableCurrent.label: Loans Payable, Current
LoansPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of portion of long-term loans payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

LongTermDebt.label: Long-term Debt
LongTermDebt.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-term Debt, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Next Rolling Twelve Months
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year One
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-term Debt, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Rolling Year Five
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-term Debt, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Rolling Year Four
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-term Debt, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Rolling Year Three
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing in the third rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-term Debt, Maturities, Repayments of Principal in Rolling Year Two
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirements, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable prices and dates maturing in the second rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Five
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Four
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Three
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Two
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

ManagementFeeExpense.label: Management Fee Expense
ManagementFeeExpense.description: Amount of expenses related to the managing member or general partner for management of the day-to-day business functions of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

MembersEquityAttributableToNoncontrollin.label: Members' Equity Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
MembersEquityAttributableToNoncontrollin.description: Amount of ownership interest in limited liability company (LLC) directly or indirectly attributable to noncontrolling interests.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAllocatedToGeneralPartners.label: Net Income (Loss) Allocated to General Partners
NetIncomeLossAllocatedToGeneralPartners.description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to general partners.

NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners.label: Net Income (Loss) Allocated to Limited Partners
NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners.description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to limited partners.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) available to outstanding limited partnership (LP) unit-holder.

NotesAndLoansPayableCurrent.label: Notes and Loans Payable, Current
NotesAndLoansPayableCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of the portions of all long-term notes and loans payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

NotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
NotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, classified as current. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

NumberOfOperatingSegments.label: Number of Operating Segments
NumberOfOperatingSegments.description: Number of operating segments. An operating segment is a component of an enterprise: (a) that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same enterprise), (b) whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the enterprise's chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance, and (c) for which discrete financial information is available. An operating segment may engage in business activities for which it has yet to earn revenues, for example, start-up operations may be operating segments before earning revenues.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OperatingLeaseLeaseIncome.label: Operating Lease, Lease Income
OperatingLeaseLeaseIncome.description: Amount of operating lease income from lease payments and variable lease payments paid and payable to lessor. Includes, but is not limited to, variable lease payments not included in measurement of lease receivable.

OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementDepreciati.label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Depreciation Expense on Property Subject to or Held-for-lease
OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementDepreciati.description: The total depreciation charge recorded for property subject to or held for lease.

OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementLeaseReven.label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Lease Revenue
OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementLeaseReven.description: The total amount of revenue recognized for the period from operating leases, including minimum lease revenue, contingent revenue, percentage revenue and sublease revenue.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherAssetsCurrent.label: Other Assets, Current
OtherAssetsCurrent.description: Amount of current assets classified as other.

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

OtherOperatingIncome.label: Other Operating Income
OtherOperatingIncome.description: The total amount of other operating income, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

PartnersCapital.label: Partners' Capital
PartnersCapital.description: The amount of ownership interest of different classes of partners in limited partnership.

PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Contributions
PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.description: Total contributions made by each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Distributions
PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.description: Total distributions to each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnitsN.label: Partners' Capital Account, Public Sale of Units Net of Offering Costs
PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnitsN.description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a public offering, net of offering costs. This is a parenthetical disclosure.

PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Redemptions
PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to redemptions and adjustments to redemption value. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PaymentsForProceedsFromLimitedPartnershi.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Limited Partnership
PaymentsForProceedsFromLimitedPartnershi.description: Net cash outflow or inflow from limited partnership investments held by the entity for investment purposes.

PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansReceivable.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Loans Receivable
PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansReceivable.description: The net amount paid or received by the reporting entity associated with purchase (sale or collection) of loans receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfInitialPublicOffe.label: Payments for Repurchase of Initial Public Offering
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfInitialPublicOffe.description: The cash outflow associated with the repurchase of amount received from entity's first offering of stock to the public.

PaymentsForUnderwritingExpense.label: Payments for Underwriting Expense
PaymentsForUnderwritingExpense.description: Cash paid for expenses incurred during underwriting activities (the process to review insurance applications, evaluate risks, accept or reject applications, and determine the premiums to be charged) for insurance companies.

PaymentsOfDistributionsToAffiliates.label: Payments of Distributions to Affiliates
PaymentsOfDistributionsToAffiliates.description: The distributions of earnings to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

PaymentsToAcquireEquipmentOnLease.label: Payments to Acquire Equipment on Lease
PaymentsToAcquireEquipmentOnLease.description: The cash outflow for payments to acquire rented equipment which is recorded as an asset.

PaymentsToAcquireLeaseReceivables.label: Payments to Acquire Lease Receivables
PaymentsToAcquireLeaseReceivables.description: The cash outflow for the purchase of receivables arising from the lease of real estate, equipment or other fixed assets for a specified time in exchange for payment, usually in the form of rent.

PaymentsToAcquireLimitedPartnershipInter.label: Payments to Acquire Limited Partnership Interests
PaymentsToAcquireLimitedPartnershipInter.description: Cash outflow related to the acquisition or continued holding of limited partnership interests held for investment purposes.

PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.label: Payments to Acquire Loans Receivable
PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.description: The cash outflow for the purchase of loan receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.

ProceedsFromContributionsFromAffiliates.label: Proceeds from Contributions from Affiliates
ProceedsFromContributionsFromAffiliates.description: The cash inflow from an entity that is affiliated with the entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonLimitedPartn.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Limited Partners Units
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonLimitedPartn.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common limited partners units during the period.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.description: The cash inflow during the period from additional borrowings in aggregate debt. Includes proceeds from short-term and long-term debt.

ProceedsFromNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Notes Payable
ProceedsFromNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromPartnershipContribution.label: Proceeds from Partnership Contribution
ProceedsFromPartnershipContribution.description: The cash inflow from the capital received in cash from a partner in a partnership during the period.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRestrictedCashFi.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Restricted Cash, Financing Activities
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRestrictedCashFi.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from cash and cash items that are not available for withdrawal or usage.

ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfLoansRece.label: Proceeds from Sale and Collection of Loans Receivable
ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfLoansRece.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale and collection of loans receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

ProceedsFromSaleOfLeaseReceivables.label: Proceeds from Sale of Lease Receivables
ProceedsFromSaleOfLeaseReceivables.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of receivables arising from the lease of real estate, equipment or other fixed assets for a specified time in exchange for payment, usually in the form of rent; excludes proceeds from sales-type lease transactions, which are classified as operating activities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansReceivable.label: Proceeds from Sale of Loans Receivable
ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansReceivable.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of loans receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.label: Property Subject to or Available for Operating Lease, Accumulated Depreciation
PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.description: The amount of accumulated depreciation, by major property class, recorded on property subject to or available for lease as of the balance sheet date.

PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.label: Property Subject to or Available for Operating Lease, Gross
PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services subject to or available for lease.

PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.label: Property Subject to or Available for Operating Lease, Net
PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.description: The amount of property, by major property class, net of accumulated depreciation, subject to or available for lease as of the balance sheet date.

ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.label: Provision for Loan and Lease Losses
ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.description: Amount of expense related to estimated loss from loan and lease transactions.

RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Repayments of Notes Payable
RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Excluding Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.description: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForFina.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Finance Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForFina.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for finance lease liability.

SecurityDepositLiability.label: Security Deposit Liability
SecurityDepositLiability.description: This element represents money paid in advance to protect the provider of a product or service, such as a lessor, against damage or nonpayment by the buyer or tenant (lessee) during the term of the agreement. Such damages may include physical damage to the property, theft of property, and other contractual breaches. Security deposits held may be interest or noninterest bearing.

WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.label: Weighted Average Limited Partnership Units Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.description: Weighted average number of limited partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

IncomeTaxReconciliationDispositionOfAsse.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Disposition of Asset, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationDispositionOfAsse.description: Amount of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to disposition of asset. Includes, but is not limited to, intra-entity transfer of asset other than inventory.

IncomeLossAttributableToParent.label: Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent, before Tax
IncomeLossAttributableToParent.description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) attributable to parent. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

LimitedPartnersCumulativeCashDistributio.label: Limited Partners' Cumulative Cash Distributions
LimitedPartnersCumulativeCashDistributio.description: Aggregate cumulative cash distributions made to the limited partners.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableRe.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableRe.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, from recovery.

AssetImpairmentCharges.label: Asset Impairment Charges
AssetImpairmentCharges.description: Amount of write-down of assets recognized in the income statement. Includes, but is not limited to, losses from tangible assets, intangible assets and goodwill.

FinanceLeaseImpairmentLoss.label: Finance Lease, Impairment Loss
FinanceLeaseImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of impairment loss from right-of-use asset from finance lease.
